content.query:
DROP PROC L_CARD_TRANSACTION_ETL;
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE PROC [dbo].[L_CARD_TRANSACTION_ETL] @data_date [int] AS BEGIN
    TRUNCATE TABLE Standardized.L_CARD_TRANSACTION;
    INSERT INTO Standardized.L_CARD_TRANSACTION
    SELECT 
         Standardized.FunctionHashMD5('CARD_TRANSACTION' + '-' + b.ID + '-' + b.contract_number + '-' + a.ID) AS [Card_X_Transaction Hashkey]
        ,Standardized.FunctionHashMD5('CARD' + '-' + b.id + '-' + b.contract_number) AS [Card HashKey]
        ,Standardized.FunctionHashMD5('TRANSACTION' + '-' + a.id) AS [Transaction HashKey]
        ,'LandingBank.CardTransaction' AS [Record Source]
        ,CONVERT(date, GETDATE() ,103) AS [Load Date]
    FROM [LandingBank].[CardTransaction]  a 
    inner join [LandingBank].[Card] b ON b.data_date=@data_date and b.amnd_state='A' and b.con_cat='C' and b.base_relation is null and a.target_contract=b.id
    where a.data_date=@data_date and a.amnd_state='A';
END;
GO

;
SELECT top 100
        Standardized.FunctionHashMD5('CARD' + '-' + b.id + '-' + b.contract_number) AS [Card HashKey]
        ,'CARD' + '-' + b.id + '-' + b.contract_number
        , a.id
    FROM [LandingBank].[CardTransaction]  a 
    inner join [LandingBank].[Card] b ON b.amnd_state='A' and b.con_cat='C' and b.base_relation is null and a.target_contract=b.id
    where a.amnd_state='A'
    and b.id=3788067   --970448XXXXXX4450;
;

select top 100 id, target_contract, * from [LandingBank].[CardTransaction] where target_contract=3788067
;

select id  from [LandingBank].[Card] where id=7973656 and amnd_State='A' and con_cat='C';

select count(1) from Standardized.h_card;

select  count(1) FROM [LandingBank].[Card] 
WHERE AMND_STATE='A' AND CON_CAT='C' AND BASE_RELATION IS NULL
